column1: Little Goat Diner////The food was pretty good
column2: as many reviewers have said before me.  We've eaten at Girl and the Goat and loved it
column3: and while this was nowhere near as amazing
column4: it was still pretty good.  Big portions for the price.  We had the bulls eye french toast
column5: which was a good mix of flavors and not overly greasy like your typical chicken and waffles.  Also tried an omelette
column6: which was very good as well but nothing too spectacular.
